heading: Folk songs.
general-note: Here are entered collections of folk songs in various unrelated languages. Works in a single language or group of languages are entered under this heading with language qualifier, e.g.. Folk songs, English; Folk songs, Slavic.. For works consisting of folk songs of an individual ethnic group, an additional subject entry is made under the heading. [ethnic group]--Music,. or. [ethnic group]--[place]--Music,. when appropriate. For works consisting of folk songs of a particular place, an additional subject entry is made under the heading. Folk music--[place]. or. Music--[place]..
